name: unvisited
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a place is unvisited, no one has gone there: There are still plenty of unvisited places around the world. The field contains neat rows of unvisited graves.
(of a person) not having had any visitors: He spent a month lying in a hospital bed, unvisited by his family and friends. She spent her last days alone, unvisited by her children and grandchildren. Related word
visit
More examplesFewer examplesThe area is relatively unvisited and so the animals here are not used to humans.The school had been unvisited by inspectors for five years.For much of the last century, this region was almost completely unvisited by foreigners.
